title: Champion Relative Height and Weight

replies.body:
I love everything about this.

And I wholeheartedly agree that Akali likely has the quads of an angel.
I think it's safe to say if Riot ever makes a League movie or show, they'll have to cast someone with Chun-li thighs for Akali lol.
Thanks! I try. :]

> Annie
3'3 35lbs

That's about the height and weight of a 3-4 year old.

Assuming Annie is around 7 years old, to have average height/weight she should be around 3'9" and 50 pounds.
Good to know!

Also, trying to help with Elise:

> My googling "how much would a giant spider weight" came back with no results. :[

Elise's spider form has about the same shape as a black widow, so let's take the rough weight and size of an actual black widow:

1.5 inches long, 0.5 inches wide, weighs .035 ounces

Keeping your ratio of 8 ft long / 4 ft tall, we can give this black widow a height of 0.75 inches.

Now we start to pretend this spider is rectangular.

If this spider fits into a 1.5 by 0.75 by 0.5 inch rectangular solid, that's 0.035 ounces of spider per 0.5625 cubic inch of spider.

Elise's spider form would be 8 by 4 by 2.666 feet, or 96 by 48 by 32 inches, or 147,456 cubic inches of spider.

Meaning it weighs 9,175.04 ounces, or 573.44 pounds.

However, at that size and with that weight, her spider legs would collapse under the weight of the body. We can either assume the body is built lighter or the legs sturdier or both, so that weight would be just a guideline for how much a spider of that shape in that size might weigh.
http://www.thepolitesse.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/The-More-You-Know.png
I thought Annie was 5 years old? :) I might be wrong

I don't actually know her age, oops. I *think* the only mention of her age was that at age 2 she bound Tibbers to her will, but that may be wrong.

I guessed around 7 because younger (personally) feels... strange, to me. She's pretty eloquent already though obviously lacking in maturity, so that age felt about right. I'm curious what her real age is, though, she IS pretty precocious.
Wait. You made {{champion:55}} 95 lbs?!
Any suggestions for a different weight? She seems like one of the smallest champions to me. A gymnast.
A gymnast has a lot of muscle. A *lot* of muscle. Muscle is dense, far denser than fat, so even while remaining small she would probably weigh more than that. I'd rec at least 110 pounds.
She has big boobs. I'd say that alone would push her over 100 at least. Plus muscle is pretty heavy, though she is lean.
Boobs do not weigh 15 lbs

No of course not, but you can judge a woman's general weight based on boob size. A well-endowed woman is not going to be less than 100lbs, even if she's super lean. Also, boobs are pretty weighty. I'd say a single D-sized breast could weigh 5 pounds easy, probably more like 7.

Source: http://discovermagazine.com/2005/nov/physics-of-bras#.UU5wkVfgVkY Also, I come from a family of fairly large-breasted women.
I agree with what everyone else has been saying, but my main concern about Kat's height and weight is that she's smaller than Jinx in this list. I personally would put her around 5'5, 125lbs
I made some slight changes to Kat. <3
Seeing how I'm heavier than that and Kat is a trained soldier, I'd put her in Akali's weight, maybe a bit heavier. Akali just seems younger than me, and she's definitely more acrobatic IMO than Kat.
I think given their talent pool and body proportions, Akali would have a lot more muscle on her body than Kat.
Fiddlesticks shouldn't weigh that much.  you can get a better look at him in his skins, he's just sticks and straw.  The only part of him that weighs anything is probably his scythe.

I'm pretty sure Riven's, like, made of muscle, given that she swings that monstrosity of a sword around with grace and ease. So she should probably weigh more than me (I have no fat or muscle on me - skinny like a frikkin rail).
Wow, nice work. Just a suggestion for ur geusswork fiddle, since he's just some cloth, twigs and hay, he's probably very light. He also walks very lightly too, with a bounce in his steps.

I really like this list and the way you've set it out. A lot of these seem really reasonable estimates considering, but there's one thing that bugs me about it thus far...

> Malphite
15ft tall, 7 feet broad at the shoulders 5 tons That's a lot of rocks.

Lu Bu, have you not seen how MASSIVE Malphite is in his new splash? He is quite literally a mountain!

Also as a suggestion, as someone from Europe, could you possibly do a little conversion and add meters/centimeter heights? Even though in Britain we use both Imperial and Metric measurements, having the Metric measurements is helpful for a lot of people.

Google helps a ton. Type in "35 lbs in kg" as a search and bam.

(That's how I do all of my conversions. Silly imperial system.)
BLURRRRGH, I can try to make the conversions, that's a lot of typing though so I can't guarantee it tonight. Lemme check on the new Malph art.
As much as this topic is interesting, I think what people want to know is the ladies' measurements. XD
I am not privy to such information!

* I believe {{champion:89}} is 6'3" range. Valka, Hiccup's mother, from *How To Train Your Dragon 2* is actually that tall. If she isn't comparable to Leona, I don't know who is.
* {{champion:22}} stops where {{champion:48}}'s neck begins.
* {{champion:51}}'s hat reaches the bottom of {{champion:111}}'s viewport.
My estimates are from in-game.

That's the problem, the game ain't that accurate, hence why Yordles; a diminutive race of people, are comparable in size to most people in game. Everything has to be constrained to a specific size due to game play. This whole thing is made to actually estimate how big the champions actually are in the lore.
I do not believe *A New Dawn* accurately portrays Nautilus' height. A diving suit for a single man that can be transported on a wooden ship *cannot* be that big.
Maybe it does, maybe it doesn't. Look at malphite's new spash. He's enormous.
Malphite hasn't been given a definite size. Nautilus however, is defined by being bound to his diving suit.

He was, until he sunk to the bottom of the ocean and was covered in crazy black magic goop, forever being warped into a new person/thing that we see before us. They've never explained all the ways natuilus was changed.
If so you need to see that each person would at least be 20 feet tall, as they are the size of trees in summoners rift. :P just sayin :3

Remember that a lot of the art is contradictory, because if the Caitlyn statement is true then in the New Dawn video she'd be approx 20 feet tall. And I know Leona is based on Mike's wife so I just asked someone her height. :3

> [{quoted}](name=OH NO ITS LU BU,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bWawYfgE,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-08-03T23:11:06.441+0000)
>
> **Cho'Gath**{{champion:31}} 
> 20ft at zero stacks with a weight of 6-7 tons, 55ft at 6 stacks with a weight of 12-13 tons. Looked at dinosaurs to compare. Cho has to be large enough to eat another champion, so i tried to keep that in mind with even the zero stack Cho

Cho'gath growing twice as tall with the same proportions being only about twice the weight as he was is physically impossible. The square-cube law dictates he would have to be eight times heavier.

I feel that naut isn't actually portrayed perfectly in the new video.  Think about it.  He fell into the deep in his suit, and then was all corrupted.  So yes he has to be larger than average to carry the anchor (or uncharacteristically strong for a normal male) and of course the old fashioned suit would add some bulk, but there isn't any lore-ical reason for him to be larger than life!{{champion:111}}

I scrolled just a little initially and thought, "Wow, this is cool!" Then I scrolled *all the way down* and thought, "**ZOMG DIS IS AMAZE!"**

Most importantly, what are the measurements of Lu Bu?
250 lbs of rage.
Now is there a size conversion table in terms of Teemos?

There's a bunch more too, including the two I mentioned.
I feel like Jayce should be more than 185 pounds at 6 feet. Because Im 6'2 and weigh 180 and Jayce looks a lot bigger than me lol.
I feel like your way off on Sion's height, the dude is a fucking towers over most if not all champions.
Im a bit nitpicky (and not trying to be mean), but where are some newer champions like Kled, Camille, etc.?
This was posted 3 years ago.  You can't expect a 3 year old post to have anything about champions that came out in the past 3 years.
Oh, haha. Didnt se the post date. Apologies.
Are you sure abou Syndra's Height? I was playing her the other day, and the gal is massive in comparison. I'd think she's at least the same height as Janna, if not taller.

I think the League women in your theory are way too tall. I can barely find an avarage-size woman, and not a single small one, only children and tall ones. The avarage size in the EU is around 5'5, and if google can be trusted USA women are even smaller, so this is kind weird to me. Is Lux really the ONLY small woman in League?
